wikitext.*:
{{expansion}}
{{video game infobox
| image = The Lord of the Rings - Rise to War.png
| name=The Lord of the Rings: Rise to War
| developer=[[Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment]]
| publisher=NetEase, Inc
| platform=Microsoft Windows, Mobiles
| releasedate=[[23 September]], [[2021]]
| genre=Real-time strategy
|}}
'''''The Lord of the Rings: Rise to War''''' is a mobile video game, produced by [[Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment|Warner Bros.]] and NetEase, Inc. It was released online on [[23 September]], [[2021]].

It is set in the latter days of the [[Third Age]], and it features familiar characters and locations from [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film trilogy]].<ref>https://twitter.com/wbgames/status/1272584740638527492?s=20</ref>

==Music==
The game also includes [[Howard Shore]]'s music from the [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film trilogy]].
